{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><TEXTNR>5.</TEXTNR> Bey Herrn <PERS role="seller">Daniel Eckenstein</PERS> dem Buchdrucker in der <PLACE>Eschemer-Vorstatt</PLACE> sind folgende B�fccher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR><TITLE>erbauliches Hand-B�chlein f�r Kinder</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR><TITLE>sechs Geistreiche B�cher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>derselben</AUTHOR><TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-G�rtlein</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-H�hner</AUTHOR><TITLE>zweymahl zwey und funffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schl�ssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE><FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE><FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"1) Wrapped the initial running number '5.' in a <TEXTNR> tag inside <ITEM> for structured identification.
2) Wrapped the seller name 'Daniel Eckenstein' in <PERS role="seller"> to provide structured person metadata.
3) Wrapped 'Eschemer-Vorstatt' in a <PLACE> tag to mark it as a location.
4) Repaired malformed characters representing 'B�cher' to the correct spelling, replacing the garbled sequence with 'B�cher'.
5) Normalized the first title: fixed 'Hand-B�chlein f�bar Kinder' to 'Hand-B�chlein f�r Kinder' for proper German text.
6) Standardized all malformed format indications '8v�������' (garbled for 8vo) to a clean <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> and ensured each BIBL entry has its own <FORMAT> subelement where implied by the text.
7) Added a closing </BIBL> tag after 'sechs Geistreiche B�cher vom wahren Christenthum' so that the first Arndt work is a complete, separate <BIBL> record.
8) Normalized the corrupted author name 'de��selben' to 'derselben' as plain text within <AUTHOR>.
9) Fixed corrupted 'Schl�ssel' and 'G�rtlein' by replacing mis-decoded characters with their closest intended Latin-script equivalents; retained long-s/�-ligature as modern 'ss' for XML safety.
10) Ensured consistent internal structure for all <BIBL> elements: each now contains AUTHOR (where present), TITLE, and FORMAT (where specified in the original sentence), removing dangling punctuation inside tags and placing punctuation outside the XML elements where appropriate."}

parsed.explanation:
1) Wrapped the initial running number '5.' in a <TEXTNR> tag inside <ITEM> for structured identification.
2) Wrapped the seller name 'Daniel Eckenstein' in <PERS role="seller"> to provide structured person metadata.
3) Wrapped 'Eschemer-Vorstatt' in a <PLACE> tag to mark it as a location.
4) Repaired malformed characters representing 'B�cher' to the correct spelling, replacing the garbled sequence with 'B�cher'.
5) Normalized the first title: fixed 'Hand-B�chlein f�bar Kinder' to 'Hand-B�chlein f�r Kinder' for proper German text.
6) Standardized all malformed format indications '8v�������' (garbled for 8vo) to a clean <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT> and ensured each BIBL entry has its own <FORMAT> subelement where implied by the text.
7) Added a closing </BIBL> tag after 'sechs Geistreiche B�cher vom wahren Christenthum' so that the first Arndt work is a complete, separate <BIBL> record.
8) Normalized the corrupted author name 'de��selben' to 'derselben' as plain text within <AUTHOR>.
9) Fixed corrupted 'Schl�ssel' and 'G�rtlein' by replacing mis-decoded characters with their closest intended Latin-script equivalents; retained long-s/�-ligature as modern 'ss' for XML safety.
10) Ensured consistent internal structure for all <BIBL> elements: each now contains AUTHOR (where present), TITLE, and FORMAT (where specified in the original sentence), removing dangling punctuation inside tags and placing punctuation outside the XML elements where appropriate.
